definition: to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: Others were reported in the south of Western Sahara.
sentences.chinese: 另外，西撒哈拉沙漠南部也有蝗災的報告。

sentences.english: Soon it will be hard to find the Blue Men of the Sahara.
sentences.chinese: 不久，撒哈拉沙漠的藍人將成爲一道稀有的風景線。

sentences.english: The village of Bardai is an oasis in the heart of the Sahara Desert.
sentences.chinese: 巴爾達伊村莊是撒哈拉沙漠中心地帶的一個綠洲。

sentences.english: A member of a Berber people of northeast Algeria.
sentences.chinese: 一個撒哈拉沙漠遊牧的柏柏爾民族成員。

sentences.english: It is going to Saraha desert without a guide which is just a compass.
sentences.chinese: 這就如去撒哈拉沙漠而沒有嚮導，少了指南針。

sentences.english: This is especially true in sub-Saharan Africa, which falls behind on all of the goals.
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉沙漠以南的非洲地區落後於所有的目標。

sentences.english: We assert that wild lions can ipso facto not be observed in the Sahara desert.
sentences.chinese: 我們斷言事實上撒哈拉沙漠中不可能有野生獅子。

sentences.english: The Sahara desert is a natural barrier that separates Northern and Central Africa.
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉沙漠是分隔北非和中非的天然屏障。

sentences.english: A member of a nomadic Berber people of the Sahara.
sentences.chinese: 一個撒哈拉沙漠遊牧的柏柏爾民族成員。

sentences.english: The heatwave has been blamed on masses of hot air from the Sahara Desert moving north.
sentences.chinese: 這場熱浪歸罪於從撒哈拉沙漠向北襲來的大量熱空氣。

sentences.english: Yes, there were the immediate Sub Saharan nations such as Songhai and Mali.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，撒哈拉沙漠以南也有像索馬里和馬裏這些國家。

sentences.english: Pandya says there were very few sub-Saharan Africans among them.
sentences.chinese: 潘迪亞說，當中撒哈拉沙漠以南的非洲人很少。

sentences.english: The playground is a typical sub-Saharan dirt field.
sentences.chinese: 操場是典型的撒哈拉沙漠地帶。

sentences.english: Many of those people are living in Sub-Saharan Africa and Asia.
sentences.chinese: 其中大多數人居住在撒哈拉沙漠以南的非洲和亞洲。

sentences.english: African elephant lives in sub-Saharan Africa. There it inhabits savannas and forests.
sentences.chinese: 非洲象居住在非洲次撒哈拉沙漠的大草原和森林中。

sentences.english: The addax lives in the Sahara Desert of northern Africa.
sentences.chinese: 旋角羚羊生活在北非洲的撒哈拉沙漠中。

pinyin: Ta3 ke4 la1 ma3 gan1 Sha1 mo4

definition: Andes mountain chain of South America

pinyin: Qi3 li4 ma3 zha1 luo2 shan1
